title: Guard Your Heart: Start Thinking Overcoming Thoughts | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Guard Your Heart: Start Thinking Overcoming Thoughts | Victoria Osteen
description:
Our lives follow the direction of our thoughts. If we’re going to become everything God created us to be, we have to pay attention to what we're thinking. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
